name: Hotel Chataura
description:
Located within 6.6 miles of Cathedral of St. Paul and 7.2 miles of Detroit Symphony Orchestra Hall, Hotel Chataura provides rooms in Dearborn. The property is around 8.4 miles from TCF Center, 4.6 miles from Baker College and 6.4 miles from Motown Historical Museum. Gem Theater is 8 miles away and Music Hall Center is 8.1 miles from the hotel.
At the hotel, the rooms are equipped with a closet and a flat-screen TV. Each room is equipped with a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Guest rooms at Hotel Chataura include air conditioning and a desk.
The accommodation can conveniently provide information at the reception to help guests to get around the area.
Masonic Temple Theater is 7.4 miles from Hotel Chataura, while The Fillmore Detroit is 7.7 miles away. The nearest airport is Detroit Metro Airport, 12 miles from the hotel.

name: Mint House Detroit - New Center
description:
You're eligible for a Genius discount at Mint House Detroit - New Center! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.
Located in Detroit, Mint House Detroit - New Center offers accommodations with free WiFi and flat-screen TV, as well as a fitness center and a shared lounge.
Each unit is fitted with air conditioning, private bathroom and a kitchen including a fridge, oven, dishwasher and a microwave. A stovetop and toaster are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and an electric tea pot.
A grill is available for guests to use at the condo hotel.
TCF Center is 4.1 miles from Mint House Detroit - New Center, while Motown Historical Museum is a 9-minute walk from the property. The nearest airport is Windsor International Airport, 11 miles from the accommodation.

name: The Inn at 97 Winder
description:
You're eligible for a Genius discount at The Inn at 97 Winder! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.
Set in Detroit, Michigan, 1,300 feet from The Fillmore Detroit, The Inn at 97 Winder features a sun terrace and views of the city. Free WiFi is available and private parking is available on site.
Every room comes with a flat-screen TV. All rooms include a seating area where you can relax and a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find bathrobes and slippers.
You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property.
The hotel also offers car hire. Gem Theater is 1,950 feet from The Inn at 97 Winder, while Masonic Temple Theater is 2,300 feet away. The nearest airport is Detroit Metro Airport, 17 mi from The Inn at 97 Winder.

userReviews.title: Amazing decor!
userReviews.positive:
The decor of the entire facility was amazing, rich in history and art. The location was also very central, easy to walk to restaurants and downtown.
Breakfast was great too with a bunch of options in pastry, fruit, and yogurt. You could also always get access to coffee and tea in the common rooms.
userReviews.negative:
The room was slightly cold because of the wind coming through the window panes. To be fair, the inn is already doing a lot to help with this, such as having towels at the window to block out the wind, or offering an extra set of blankets. Nevertheless, it was still a bit cold to stay in winter.
I think the inn is still worth to stay in because of how amazing the decor is, just come prepared with good warm pajamas if you are staying during the winter time.

name: Comfort Inn Downtown Detroit
description:
In the heart of Detroit city center and a short distance from the Renaissance Center and area casinos, this hotel features a complimentary deluxe breakfast. Free WiFi and parking is available to all guests.
Guests can enjoy the comfort of coffee/tea makers, ironing facilities, and hair dryers in all rooms. Select rooms will also offer a microwave, refrigerator, and spa baths.
Guests at the Comfort Inn Downtown Detroit will appreciate the free shuttle service on the weekends to area attractions, within a 3 miles radius, an on-site exercise room, and business center.
Comfort Inn Downtown Detroit places guests minutes from the area's top attractions. Comerica Park, home to baseball's Tigers, MotorCity Casino and the MGM Grand Detroit are in close proximity.

name: Trumbull and Porter - Detroit Downtown
description:
You're eligible for a Genius discount at Trumbull and Porter - Detroit Downtown! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.
This boutique hotel with an artistic flair is near unique restaurants and entertainment in the historic Corktown neighborhood of Detroit. Trumbull and Porter - Detroit Downtown offers free WiFi throughout and is 30 minutes drive from Detroit Metropolitan Airport.
Rooms at the Trumbull & Porter include a 50-inch flat-screen TV and a refrigerator. The rooms also include an iron and hairdryer for guests' convenience.
A spacious fitness center with downtown Detroit views is perfect for an inspiring workout. A courtyard music venue and beer garden are provided for guests to enjoy. and private dining for on-site entertainment as well.
Trumbull and Porter - Detroit Downtown in the center of Detroit, is near many casinos, popular stadiums (Ford Field and Comerica Park), Greektown, Cobo Center, the Henry Ford Museum, and Windsor, Canada.

userReviews.negative:
The room was not as clean as the first few times I stayed there.  There was beard hair that was shaved off in the trays that hold the shampoos and body wash.  One of the towels that I grabbed seemed clean but had stains on it so did not use had to grab other towels there and check them all.  The other major thing was no hand soap in my room or my family's room. 
When I went downstairs to ask for one they said they where all out.  This to me was something very important to have. 
 They only gave me more body wash to use as hand soap. There used to be rugs by the bed to keep your feet from hitting the hard cold concrete floor when you wake up and get out of bed.  Not sure I would stay here again when I go back to Detroit.  I go to Detroit a lot now since my son is going to college there.

name: Fort Pontchartrain Detroit, a Wyndham Hotel
description:
Featuring an on-site restaurant this hotel is 5 minutes’ walk from the Detroit Riverwalk and the Detroit-Windsor Tunnel.  Each guest room is equipped with free WiFi.
A flat-screen cable TV is provided in every room at Fort Pontchartrain Detroit, a Wyndham Hotel. Guests can enjoy the in-room tea and coffee-making facilities and a free newspaper delivered daily.
 A business center with fax and photocopying services is also featured.
Urban Cellars is on site and serves American cuisine for breakfast, lunch and dinner.  The lounge has a range of cocktails and beverages to choose from.
Ford Field, home of football’s Lions, and Comerica Park, home of baseball’s Tigers, are 1 miles away.  Coleman A. Young International Airport can be reached in 15 minutes’ drive.

name: DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Detroit Downtown - Fort Shelby
description:
This downtown Detroit hotel offers on-site dining and a state-of-the-art fitness center. Just a 7-minute walk from MGM Grand Detroit Casino, the hotel provides free WiFi in every room.
55 Inch Flat Panel HD with HBO is featured in the contemporary rooms at DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Detroit Downtown - Fort Shelby. There is also a coffee maker, desk and safe.
Guests can dine at Motor City Kitchen and Round Bar, featuring burgers and American cuisine. Motor City Market, also on site, serves breakfast and lunch.
Downtown Detroit DoubleTree Suites is just steps from the Fort/Cass Bus Station and a 15-minute walk from Greektown. Ford Field, home of the Detroit Lions football team, is within a 20-minutes' walk.

address.full: 525 West Lafayette Boulevard, Downtown Detroit, Detroit, MI 48226, United States of America

userReviews.title: Perfectly located property for downtown fun.
userReviews.positive: I loved the location and the esthetics of the interior design.
userReviews.negative:
The suites sleeper pull out was dirty with food crumbs. I called downstairs to request linens and the front desk attendant seemed to be in disbelief that I needed a top sheet. I forgot all about complaining about the crumby mattress.
Once the linens arrived the young woman who didn’t greet me asked, “what’s the problem?” I told her I needed a top sheet. She told me she was told that I requested a full change of the room’s linen. I informed her it wasn’t necessary. I chose not to tell her of the crumby mattresses as well because she was already in a terrible mood. 
I understand that workers are hard to come by these days but I think this is more of a reflection on how the Hilton treats it staff. when you have happy workers your guest will feel it.

name: Detroit Foundation Hotel
description:
Ideally set in Detroit, Detroit Foundation Hotel has air-conditioned rooms, a fitness center, free WiFi and a shared lounge. The property has a bar, as well as a restaurant serving American cuisine. The property provides room service, a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage for guests.
At the hotel, rooms are equipped with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Rooms come with a safety deposit box and some have city views. The rooms have a closet.
Breakfast is available each morning, and includes continental, American and vegetarian options.
Popular points of interest near Detroit Foundation Hotel include TCF Center, GM World and Saint Andrews Hall. The nearest airport is Windsor International Airport, 7.5 miles from the accommodation.

userReviews.title: A higher than moderate price for a generally delightful one night treat in downtown Detroit.
userReviews.positive: The hotel is in an easily accessible location in downtown Detroit.   The building is fantastic, but it's from an earlier era.  The redo is attractive, but it is somewhat industrial.  The beds and bathrooms were glorious.    The deepest sleep I have had in months...  Air-con/ventilation was superb -- ran on the cool side, which we liked.    Nice arm chair and chaise.   In and out valet, which we didn't use, but helpful.  Very nice double window shades -- blackout and transparent shade screen, on pullers.   The shower was delicious with various toiletries (wash, cream, shampoo, conditioner) -- fragrant soap.
userReviews.negative: Lighting in the rooms is a bit weird.  No light at the desk, yet bright lights at the entrance and in various corners.  One small desk and small chair -- not the best for those needing to do work.   The windows are not entirely soundproof.  Though we generally had quiet, there was a 5 am garbage collection that was quite noisy -- and we were in the back on an alley!   The hotel restaurant is spacious with unique furnishings, but breakfast was semi-take-out, with limited menu, with some items failing.  Service was great.   We did not eat dinner there, but we noted a good crowd on a weeknight the evening we arrived.   We didn't fully realize that the one night reservation we had was fully pre-pay, but that's our bad.

userReviews.title: Lovely historic Detroit hotel
userReviews.positive: I love a good historic hotel, and this one definitely fits the bill! They've left a lot of the old fire station character, but have updated it into a really comfortable hotel. It's in a good location in downtown Detroit, and the rooms are large and comfortable. We also loved the Apparatus Room for dinner and drinks!
userReviews.negative: If you're like us and don't live in a city, you might want to bring some earplugs to drown out the nighttime street noise (mostly loud engines and the occasional siren).

userReviews.title: Wonderful

userReviews.title: Unique fire station turn into hotel
userReviews.positive: The lounge is spectacular, it kept the original tiles of the former fire station as well as the doors for the trucks to go in and out. The bedroom was pretty and very well equipped, decent size but the furniture and outlets makes it a very comfortable room.
userReviews.negative: The restaurant is closed Monday and Tuesday (due to covid) which is not properly informed. At this price range not having a restaurant on site makes it hard to recommend for those days.

name: Cambria Hotel Detroit Downtown
description:
In a prime location in the Downtown Detroit district of Detroit, Cambria Hotel Detroit Downtown is located a 15-minute walk from The Fillmore Detroit, 0.9 miles from Music Hall Center and a 18-minute walk from Gem Theater. The property is around 1.7 miles from Detroit Symphony Orchestra Hall, 2.7 miles from Cathedral of St. Paul and 3.7 miles from Motown Historical Museum. The property is half a mile from the city center and a 10-minute walk from TCF Center.
Popular points of interest near the hotel include GM World, Saint Andrews Hall and Masonic Temple Theater. The nearest airport is Windsor International Airport, 8.1 miles from Cambria Hotel Detroit Downtown.

name: The Detroit Club
description:
You're eligible for a Genius discount at The Detroit Club! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.
Set in Detroit, a 3-minute walk from the TCF Convention Center, The Detroit Club features air-conditioned rooms with complimentary WiFi. Each guest at the 5-star property can enjoy city views from the rooms.
At the hotel, all rooms come with a wardrobe and a flat-screen TV. The private bathroom is equipped with complimentary toiletries. At The Detroit Club, rooms are equipped with a seating area.
Capturing the historic charm of the Detroit Club, the Grille Room offers a captivating menu featuring French inspired American fare and an extensive wine list.
Guests can make use of the sauna and fitness center. Billiards is also available at the accommodations. The on-site spa features a salt-water jacuzzi in the Grotto, dry saunas, lounges, fitness center, body, skin, and nail treatments
Staff at the reception can provide information on what to do in the area.

userReviews.title: Historic club near the waterfront
userReviews.positive: The historic building and club facilities were beautiful and every corner felt like walking in a museum. The bed in the honeymoon suite was superb, comfortable, and warm. I especially enjoyed the in-room deep soaking claw foot tub. Thoughtful details were peppered throughout the room. The front desk went above and beyond when I had injured my foot during my stay. They don't allow meal delivery services, like door dash, to deliver to the club. But one call to the front desk and, even though the restaurant was closed for that evening, the chef made me a delicious meal!
userReviews.negative: Because this is a historic building, the windows were single-pane and a bit drafty. They aren't very good at noise reduction, so early in the morning and into the late evening,  I could hear the sound of the city public transportation quite clearly - and the buzzing alert sound of the parking garage across the street every time a car left the building. I also had a slight issue on check-in when I was arriving very early on a red eye flight, so I booked the room starting the night of my flight so I could check into the hotel immediately to get some rest.  Despite communicating my intent and getting assurance that they would check me into the room the night I was flying, the night security wasn't informed so when I arrived there was some confusion whether I was a no show or not. Alex at the front desk cleared it up when they arrived, though!

name: Atheneum Suite Hotel
description:
This Detroit hotel is located in the Greektown District, next to the Greektown Casino. The all-suite hotel offers free WiFi, free area shuttle service and an on-site restaurant & bar.
Atheneum Suite Hotel features 42-inch flat-screen TV and MP3 docking station in every spacious suite. Separate sitting areas and room service during select hours are also available. A refrigerated mini-bar and in-room safe are available in all rooms.
A fitness center and concierge services are available at the Atheneum Suite Hotel, as well as a 24-hours business center and front desk. Banquet and meeting facilities are also features at this hotel.
Comerica Park, home of the Detroit Tigers baseball team, is a 5-minute drive from the Atheneum Hotel. The University of Detroit is less than one mile away.

name: Sonder Gabriel Richard
description:
You're eligible for a Genius discount at Sonder Gabriel Richard! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.
Located in the center of Detroit, within a 15-minute walk of TCF Center and 0.6 miles of Music Hall Center, Sonder Gabriel Richard provides accommodations with free WiFi.
Accommodations are fitted with air conditioning, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with bath or shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. An oven, a dishwasher and microwave are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and an electric tea pot.
Popular points of interest near the condo hotel include The Fillmore Detroit, Gem Theater and GM World. The nearest airport is Windsor International Airport, 7.5 miles from Sonder Gabriel Richard.

name: The Westin Book Cadillac Detroit
description:
Located in downtown Detroit within 10 minutes' walk away from Ford Field and the Joe Louis Arena, this hotel features an indoor pool and in-room spa service.
The rooms at The Westin Book Cadillac Detroit are equipped with plasma-screen TVs and WiFi (surcharge).  A safety deposit box is provided. Room service is available.
Several American restaurants, a bar, and a coffee shop are all part of the facilities at The Westin Book Cadillac Detroit.  Guest can relax in the indoor pool and hot tub or book a treatment in the salon, which is located within the hotel. There is a business center and 24-hour concierge service.
Wayne State University and the Detroit Institute of Art are 5 minutes from The Westin Book Cadillac Detroit by car.  The MGM Casino is a 10-minute walk from this Detroit hotel.

name: Shinola Hotel
description:
Attractively set in Detroit, Shinola Hotel has air-conditioned rooms, a fitness center, free WiFi and a restaurant. Featuring a bar, the hotel is close to several noted attractions, around 1.1 miles from TCF Center, a 6-minute walk from Music Hall Center and 1,500 feet from Gem Theater. The property provides room service, a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage for guests.
At the hotel, rooms have a closet, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. The rooms have a safety deposit box.
Popular points of interest near Shinola Hotel include The Fillmore Detroit, Saint Andrews Hall and GM World. The nearest airport is Windsor International Airport, 7.5 miles from the accommodation.

name: MGM Grand Detroit
description:
Featuring an on-site casino, Topgolf lounge, luxury spa and indoor infinity-edge pool, this MGM Grand offers on-site dining and live entertainment in Detroit, Michigan.
Every room at MGM Grand Detroit provides a 50-inch flat-screen HDTV with premium cable channels and complimentary bottled water. Private bathrooms offer spa-inspired showers with rainfall shower heads.
Guests can escape to the on-site spa, which offers an array of amenities and facilities for the ultimate retreat, including an expansive indoor poor with cabana sofa seating, hot tub, steam room and sauna. A modern fitness center, business center and on-site shops are all available at the hotel.
D.PRIME Steakhouse offers a robust dinner menu of steaks, meats and seafood selections. For a more comfortable, laid back meal, guests can grab a burger at TAP. In-room dining services are also offered for guest convenience.

userReviews.positive: The spa tub in the room and hot tub.
userReviews.negative: Pool closing at 6 pm is awful. Everyone sitting in all the beds poolside playing on their phones. No one was swimming just laying in the beds. There were no places to set your stuff because all the people lounging in regular clothes and not using the pool. My thing I wanted to do the most was swim  unfortunately that didn't happen, because of all the loungers laying around. Also big downside the pool closes at 6pm maybe they can stay open longer this way people can go later, when the treatment areas close. I think all the people at poolside were waiting for significant others to get their treatments. They should have a waiting room for that or not be allowed to wait at poolside. There are hallways they could have been told to wait there. It was really annoying, I arrived there before my 4 pm check in, they also couldn't find one of my rooms, the took about 25 minutesto clear up. This took time away from my 2 hour window to use the pool. Then not to be able to swim was really sad.  I'd have to say I probably wouldn't stay again just for the fact the pool closed so early and wasn't able to use all the amenities for the price I paid.

userReviews.title: A Grand Night in Detroit!
userReviews.positive: I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of this hotel. It's full of nice touches that make all the difference between an ok stay and a great one. Highlights include room service, mini bar, super soft bedding, double shower heads and sinks, ambient lighting, white noise machine, Keurig with Starbucks coffee, in closet lighting, etc. Our 14th floor view was just perfect. Valet parking is free which is pretty much unheard of elsewhere. Front desk staff were friendly and helpful. We stayed for a concert at the Masonic Temple which was just a 10 minute walk away. After the show, we had delicious Detroit style pizza at the 24 hour food court in the casino. This hotel simply can't get much better. We will be back, hopefully sooner than later!
userReviews.negative: Check in was long and confusing. We were told valet parking was $25 when it was actually free for hotel guests. After getting this sorted, the line to check in took an hour! The hotel has two lines, for standard and premium, each with their own staff member. While a long line of regular guests waited an hour, maybe 2 premium guests arrived. It would make sense to have premium staff taking customers when no premium guests are waiting. Instead, one lonely employee had to work her butt off doing it by herself while the other employee sat next to her with no customers. With this said, the apologetic and friendly welcome received quickly made me forget any annoyance, followed by seeing our gorgeous room. Sadly, thanks to these issues, we didn't make it to our room until 5:30 and the pool closes at 6! This is my only real complaint about the hotel. The pool should be open until at least 9, better yet, 11. It then opens at 9 AM while check out is at 11. This doesn't leave much time for getting prepared to check out afterwards. For these reasons, we weren't able to use the pool at all, which was really disappointing.

userReviews.title: Coming back next year!
userReviews.positive:
The food selection within the hotel was great.
Valet service was great.
Staff and security was very helpful.

name: Mint House Detroit - Times Square
description:
You're eligible for a Genius discount at Mint House Detroit - Times Square! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.
Mint House Detroit - Times Square provides accommodations within 900 feet of the center of Detroit, with free Wifi and a kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven, and a microwave. The air-conditioned accommodations are a 19-minute walk from TCF Center. The condo hotel also offers facilities for disabled guests.
At the condo hotel, all units come with a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, and towels. A toaster, a fridge, and stovetop are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle.
Popular points of interest near the condo hotel include The Fillmore Detroit, Gem Theater, and Music Hall Center. The nearest airport is Windsor International Airport, 7.5 miles from Mint House Detroit - Times Square.

address.full: 415 Clifford Street, Downtown Detroit, Detroit, MI 48226, United States of America

name: Hilton Garden Inn Detroit Downtown
description:
Hilton Garden Inn Detroit Downtown is set in Detroit, 350 feet from Music Hall Center. Fillmore Detroit is 1,950 feet from the hotel and GM World is 2,650 feet away.
All units in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and private bathroom. A desk, microwave and refrigerator are also included.
An American breakfast is available each morning for an additional fee. The restaurant at the accommodations specializes in American cuisine.
Guests can make use of the business center or work out at the on-site fitness center.
Cobo Convention Center is an 11-minute walk from the hotel. The nearest airport is Detroit Metro Airport, 18 mi from the property.

address.full: 351 Gratiot Avenue, Downtown Detroit, Detroit, MI 48226, United States of America

name: The Inn on Ferry Street
description:
Experience the activity and energy of the city at this charming historic inn, where history comes alive and old-world elegance blends with contemporary amenities in the heart of the Detroit city center. complimentary coffee and pastries are served each morning.
Ideally located in the city's historic district, the Inn on Ferry Street is only minutes away from the area's most popular attractions. Some of the finest museums, theaters and historical sites are all within walking distance from the inn.
The Inn on Ferry Street is a beautifully restored Victorian property that provides guests with all of the modern conveniences.

address.full: 84 East Ferry Street, Detroit, 48202, United States of America

description:
Located in the David Whitney building in downtown Detroit, this hotel features a bar and lounge for guests to relax, a fitness center and free high speed WiFi. The hotel is less than 311 mi from The Fillmore, Fox Theater and General Motors Headquarters.
A 42 inch flat-screen TV and beds with pillowtop mattresses are included in every room at the Aloft Detroit at David Whitney. Amenities like a coffee maker, refrigerator and desk are provided for guests' convenience.
Guest services include a business center, 24-hour front desk and concierge services. Guests can play billiards on-site or play a round of golf at a nearby golf course.
A quick bite at re:fuel by Aloft is available for guests' hunger needs at any hour. The on-site w xyz bar offers cocktails, wine and snacks late into the night as well.
The Cobo Convention Center is 2,650 feet from the David Whitney Aloft Detroit. The nearest airport is Detroit Metro Airport, 17 mi from the property.

userReviews.title: Very Good
userReviews.positive: Detroit is a hidden gem for most people, but not us. My wife and I live about an hour outside Detroit, and we made this a weekend getaway. There is so much to explore and do in Detroit, if you're from outside the area you probably have no idea how awesome and cool it is! The restaurants, entertainment, culture, vibe, and history in this City are incredible. Oh, and our room's view of Comerica Park, Ford Field, the Opera House, etc. was spectacular!
userReviews.negative: They need to work on the welcome at the entrance. Having a person out on the sidewalk to greet us, get us assistance with luggage, and tell us where to go would have really helped with our first impression. We were a little uncertain about our choice, at least until we walked into the incredible lobby of this historic old building. From then on, everything was perfect!
userReviews.room: Guest room, 1 King, City view, Corner room

name: The Siren Hotel
description:
Featuring a bar, The Siren Hotel is set in Detroit. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service. The property is 1,000 feet from Music Hall Center and 1,000 feet from Gem Theater.
The rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with cable channels. All rooms include a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hair dryer. All rooms include a wardrobe.
Popular points of interest near The Siren Hotel include The Fillmore Detroit, Saint Andrews Hall and Cobo Convention Center. The nearest airport is Detroit Metro Airport, 17 mi from the accommodations.

address.full: 1509 Broadway Street, Downtown Detroit, Detroit, MI 48226, United States of America

userReviews.title: Second Stay at The Siren
userReviews.positive: Beautiful property. Best drinks I’ve ever had at The Candy Bar. Best Cole Slaw I’ve ever eaten at Karl’s! Cannot wait to come visit again.

userReviews.title: Beautiful hotel but needs some attention to detail for maintenance and sound proofing.
userReviews.negative: I woke up every night sweating and the AC control in the room seemed not to work. Also the pump for the shower gel didn’t work. Bed is very low to the ground and the TV is about 2ft away from the bed on the side. I could hear everything going on in the hall.  Also didn’t like that that the items (Queen coverlet and robe) being held for me were put back up by two ladies at the front desk. I was told by Ivory on Sunday night that they would hold them until I checked out and he would put a note on my account for it. Luckily the two items I wanted were still available. Please don’t promise something to a customer and then not follow through. Also every time we used the cold water it made a loud sound in the pipes.

userReviews.title: Really beautiful and enjoyable, but slightly more attention to detail would’ve made it 5 stars

It’s a beautiful hotel but I think the vintage furnishing look sometimes means things get worn down and not fixed (not necessarily in the intentional way).

userReviews.title: We had a lovely stay and appreciated the comfort and luxury, but the cost was high considering many amenities were missi
userReviews.positive: I loved the historical building and the decor. There was a lot of attention to detail that we appreciated. The staff was pleasant, especially the valet staff and the barista.
userReviews.negative: I understand that this is a boutique hotel and that being the case, some “normal” hotel amenities may be forgone, but I do feel like a lot of hotel essentials were missing, especially for the cost. At almost $800 for two nights, there was no safe in the room, no mini fridge, no coffee maker, no room service, and no fans in the bathrooms. We loved that there was a coffee bar in the lobby, but would have liked the option to purchase vs. brew coffee in the room. We would have purchased coffee regardless, but almost felt forced to, which was a little off putting due to the cost of the room.

name: Mint House Detroit - Grand Circus Park
description:
You're eligible for a Genius discount at Mint House Detroit - Grand Circus Park! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.
Mint House Detroit - Grand Circus Park offers accommodations within 1,500 feet of the center of Detroit, with free Wifi and a kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven, and a microwave. The property is close to Music Hall Center, Masonic Temple Theater, and Saint Andrews Hall. GM World is a 18-minute walk from the condo hotel, and Detroit Symphony Orchestra Hall is one mile away.
The condo hotel offers a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a hair dryer, free toiletries, and a bath or shower. At the condo hotel, units are equipped with bed linen and towels.
Popular points of interest near Mint House Detroit - Grand Circus Park include TCF Center, The Fillmore Detroit, and Gem Theater. The nearest airport is Windsor International Airport, 8.1 miles from the accommodation.

userReviews.title: Perfect Location, very comfortable apartment
